data.title: Love is Blind
data.meta_description: Love is Blind is the fourth track on Apink's ninth mini album LOOK. It is sung by members Bomi, Naeun, and Hayoung, which make up the sub unit YOS. Bomi Naeun Hayoung ALL
data.text:
hey ring ring the phone keeps ringing

You will just try your best to appear sorry

How many times has this been, your bad manner

Shut up, enough with your useless excuses, I hate trite lies

Don’t wanna think about it anymore

Just leave me alone, will you, No No

I don’t know, one moment I think I know

But the next moment I still don’t know

I know it’s not

But when I see you, I smile yet again

Oh baby, how can you shake my heart again like this

Whenever I look at you

Sweetly and thrillingly

I melt down, Danger

It’s a bit dangerous

But I don’t want to stop

How can you make my heart again

Love is Blind I’m losing my mind yeah

Love is love is

Love is love is

As if I am entranced by something

I know you’re so bad boy

But the more I know, the more I want to hug you

Could it be that only I can’t see

Don’t care, that’s how it usually is

Don’t wanna think about it anymore, just leave me alone, will you, No No

I don’t know, one moment I think I know

But the next moment I still don’t know

I know it’s not
